symlinks.notes: Enable and set target if your native Android project lives in a differently named folder (e.g., native_android/). Leave disabled if you will create/use apps/android as the real folder.
Enable and set target if your native iOS project lives in a differently named folder (e.g., native_ios/). Leave disabled if you will create/use apps/ios as the real folder.
Enable and set target if your web app folder isn't apps/web (e.g., react_web/).
Enable and set target if your RN app folder isn't apps/react_native (e.g., react_native_app/).
Enable and set target if your Node service folder isn't services/node (e.g., backend_nodejs/).
Enable and set target if your Firebase Functions folder isn't services/firebase_functions (e.g., backend_firebase/).
Enable and set target if your Spring Boot folder isn't services/spring_boot (e.g., backend_spring/).
